title: A lo kal leh dawn Lal Isua
lyrics:
A lo kal leh dawn Lal Isua, (2)
Rei lo teah a lo kal thuai ang,
Amah ringtute a hruai khawm dawn.
(A va hlimawm dawn em!)

Lalpa ngei chu au thawm nen,
Vantirhkoh chungnung ber aw nen,
Pathian tawtawrawt ri nen,
Van atangin a lo chhuk dawn,
In peih r'u, inpeih r'u,
Lal Isua a lo kal thuai dawn.

Van atangin a lo chhuk dawn, (2)
A chhandamna ngaineptute tan,
Khawngaihna hun tha a liam tawh ang.
(A va rapthlak dawn em!)

Hun khirh tak chu a thleng mek e, (2)
Sualna tinrengte a lo pung ta,
Hun hnuhnung ber a thleng ta e.
(Tunah inpeih thuai rawh.)

Lal Isua a lo kal thuai dawn, (2)
Hlim leh lawma amah tawk turin,
Khawvel hawisan la, Isua pan rawh.
(Hun tlem te chauh i nei.)
